title: Different rates of industrialization across Europe

content.prompt: The disparity on the 1910 map between the eastern region of Europe and the western and central regions was primarily the result of which of the following?

choices.label: Differences in the frequency and scale of military conflicts
Differences in the degree of political centralization
Differences in landholding patterns and agricultural practices

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
